page.title: 08Health, Swainby & Potto
page.content: These villages enjoy a strong bracing climate out of range of Teesside's industrial pollution. They are served by{a doctor}from Hutton Rudby who holds surgery at Swainby twice weekly and delivers presciptions, and by {group-practice doctors}from Stokesley Health Centre. The nearest{hospital} and ambulance service is at North- allerton. Health-service{nurses}make daily visits and do weekly bathing. A {Social Worker}arranges Home Helps (Swainby has 4) and nursing aids for the{senior citizens,}whose bungalows are connected to a warden by intercom. They can have Meals on Wheels, home chiropody and hairdressing. Several attend a Day Centre at Hutton Rudby or the Friarage Hospital. Both villages are caring communities and neighbours give help in times of sickness or when visiting is needed.
